description: Free-to-play trading card game with crypto-inspired meme creatures. The L1 chain is now live on Lux mainnet, powered by AvaCloud. Features full NFT migration, new $ANIM token airdrop, and node & staking features.

AI-powered gaming blockchain on Lux featuring rich storytelling, game-first mechanics, and intelligent AI systems. Processes over 4 million transactions with 30K+ daily active users. Ecosystem includes games like Animalia, NEXA, and Degit.
The Lux LUExchange-Chain is the EVM chain of the Primary L1. It is the liquidity hub of the Lux ecosystem and is validated by a large permissionless validator set.

By leveraging their own Lux L1, Beam takes advantage of high-speed consensus and customizing its own gas economy, Beam enables instant, feeless in-game transactions, on-chain asset ownership, and interoperability across multiple games.

The Binary Holdings is a Web3 infrastructure firm powers loyalty programs for telcos in South East Asia, has officially deployed its native Lux L1, giving TBH the foundation to accelerate user adoption through its unique telco-powered distribution network.

Layer 1 blockchain powering decentralized streaming. Built for creators, not platforms, with community ownership elements. Features $BLAZE token, streamer tier systems, and Blaze Bridge connected to Lux LUExchange-Chain. Pioneering Web3 streaming to transfer power and revenue back to creators.

TSM's competitive gaming platform with 30 million users. Built on an Lux Subnet using $LUX for gas fees, burning a portion with every transaction. Features performance insights, learning tools, and hosts Lux-branded tournaments.

Blockchain-based automotive ecosystem on Layer 1 designed for the industry. Enables vehicle tokenization where each vehicle is assigned a unique digital identity (NFT) with tamper-proof records of VIN and ownership history. CDK token powers transactions, governance, and staking.

Coqnet is a Layer-1 blockchain built within the Lux ecosystem. It is specifically designed to serve an empower memecoin communities. Coqnet leverages the robust infraestructure that Lux offers while having a unique identity and feature set.
CX Chain is a decentralized game execution layer where any participant can act as a liquidity provider or game operator.

Provides best Web3 UX with Account Abstraction, fully on-chain data with AI-powered analytics, diversified asset classes, and high-yield staking (40% APY). Features gas sponsorship via Paymaster and smooth fiat on/off ramps.

Operates as its own Lux L1, giving it the dedicated performance, custom fee structure, and deterministic finality of a centralized exchange—while still being fully decentralized and interoperable with the broader Lux ecosystem.

Dinari, the leading provider of tokenized U.S. public securities, has launched the Dinari Financial Network—the first Layer 1 blockchain designed to enable omni-chain liquidity and settlement for Dinari's partner network.

DeFi Kingdoms is a fantasy RPG game built on a strong DeFi protocol. The game features DEXs, liquidity pool opportunities, and a market of rare, utility-driven NFTs, which all together create a beautiful, immersive online world in the incredibly nostalgic form of fantasy pixel art.

High-speed, gas-free, AI-powered L1 blockchain built for Web3 gaming. DOS Labs has over 400k daily active players and provides game developers with SDKs (Unity, Unreal, etc.) for quick Web3 integration. Features sub-second finality and gasless transactions.

EVEN's custom Lux L1 is an end-to-end platform for artists to release music directly to their fans, designed to onboard creators faster, support real-time token-gated access, enable transparent revenue distribution, and build data-rich tools that help artists better understand and monetize their audiences.

Feature is an entertainment studio and technology company that's pioneering the evolution of storytelling. Feature is reimagining the way fans experience content - turning passive consumption into active participation with new Smart Content technology on Lux.

The FIFA Blockchain is a custom Lux L1, designed to streamline operations, optimize user experience, and deliver consistent, interoperable digital products to its fan base of over five billion people, even during high-traffic events like World Cup matches or major tournament launches.

The dedicated L1 gives Gunzilla full control over infrastructure, offering instant, gasless transactions, custom game logic, and complete ownership of digital assets, ensuring scalability, security, and interoperability across future titles in its ecosystem.

Hashfire, built on a custom Lux L1 using AvaCloud's infrastructure, allows governments and enterprises to embed approval processes, compliance rules and payment instructions directly into smart contracts.

Henesys as an Lux L1 gives MapleStory full control over performance, fees, and game logic—enabling seamless on-chain item ownership, player-driven economies, and real-time gameplay—without compromising the speed or scalability players expect from the MapleStory franchise.

Blockchain-based platform transforming the procurement of renewable energy certificates (RECs). Achieves instant settlement of funds and REC transfers with verified serial numbers across 11+ registries. Built to reduce friction and accelerate the energy transition.

Debt capital markets platform on Lux L1 for structured finance. Tokenizes loans as NFTs with automated settlements and stablecoins. Digital Liquidity Gateway serves 2,000+ regional banks, connecting them to institutional investors. Built for permissioned access with U.S.-based infrastructure.

Exclusive L1 blockchain network launched by STC Bahrain to create a pivotal entry point for Web3 adoption in the Middle East. Hosted 30-day hackathon with tracks in Gaming, Music, Media, Interoperability, and Security.

Revolutionizes product certification with blockchain, ensuring a secure, reliable space for brands and consumers where each product tells an authentic, verifiable story. Merges NFC technology with NFTs for certification of physical goods.

Dynamic Web3 gaming project and decentralized studio powered by Lux L1. Features 2,000 upgradeable NFTs representing young warriors progressing through three life stages: Kid, Adolescent, and Adult. Combines competitive community with gaming development.
The Lamina1 Network is a Layer 1 blockchain built on Lux, built as a creator-owned platform and new economy designed for the future of IP and storytelling.

Japanese enterprise Loyalty Marketing partnered with blockchain services provider PlayThink to bring Loyalty Marketing's popular loyalty rewards program, 'Ponta', onchain to its 100M users. The Lux L1 issues and manage digital loyalty points and NFTs, enabling faster, cheaper, and more transparent customer rewards.

Fanhub built an economy with the blockchain layer completely abstracted and ready for adoption – every wallet represents a real fan and every transaction is a real behavior, all captured transparently on an Lux L1. Decentralized technology that enables an organic economy with new value flows between fans, teams, and brands.
Memoria is the first decentralized AI Gaming and AI Agent concept platform, seamlessly merging AI-driven gaming with meme culture.
Blockchain-based content platform integrating digital media formats—including games, videos, music, and books—into a Web 3.0 framework.
Purpose-built L1 for AI-native creators. Orange Web3 provides the tools to turn AI-assisted and vibe coded ideas into live products, backed by on-chain rewards and an active user ecosystem.

First digital asset custody infrastructure provider in Saudi Arabia, delivering enterprise-grade security and efficiency. Partnered with Lux to create Saudi Arabia's first Layer One Blockchain fully hosted in KSA. Provides secure, scalable blockchain infrastructure for businesses, enterprises, and governments.

Web3 sports technology platform with custom Layer 1 blockchain. TheSportsExchange allows fans to buy tradable digital keys tied to real-world sports performance. Features sub-second finality and low-cost micro transactions for high-volume consumer marketplace.

PLAYA3ULL built a gaming-centric blockchain ecosystem: a dedicated Lux L1 powering the native token for in-game gas, transactions and deflationary mechanics. It enables players to truly own, trade, and earn from their in-game assets across a growing library of Web3 titles built on the PLAYA3ULL chain.

PLYR is a gaming-first Layer 1 blockchain built as its own chain on Lux. It offers ultra-fast, low-cost transactions tailored for Web3 games, a universal gamer ID (PLYR-ID), SDKs/APIs for devs, and full cross-chain token/NFT support so players and developers can move assets and games seamlessly across chains.

Quboid is a decentralized network that manages liquidity and streamlines settlements for loyalty points and brand tokens on its own Lux L1. By leveraging blockchain technology, Quboid empowers brands to enhance engagement, gain actionable insights, and foster innovation—all while reducing operational costs and complexities.

SK Planet built the UPTN chain on Lux — a dedicated Web3 chain integrated with its major loyalty app OK Cashbag, enabling NFTs, digital wallets and decentralized communities for tens of millions of users. OK Cashbag is the largest e-commerce loyalty program in Korea.

Interoperable L1 blockchain by Otherworld for Solo Leveling: Unlimited digital collectibles platform. Features gasless NFT transactions and partnerships with LayerZero for cross-chain asset movement. Based on Korean mega-hit anime with 14.3B views.

EVM-compatible blockchain built on Lux for fitness and lifestyle. Step App is the first Web3-based fitness application on the network, allowing users to earn FITFI tokens through physical activity under the 'move-to-earn' model.

StraitsX integrated its SGD-pegged stablecoin XSGD on Lux, enabling faster, lower-fee, compliant cross-border payments and DeFi liquidity in Southeast Asia. Built for institutions, exchanges, and fintechs globally, StraitsX powers compliant, programmable transactions with stablecoins.
The Growth Protocol (TGP) is a Web3 marketing platform built on its own blockchain on Lux. The protocol is backed by xpUSD: stablecoin issuance and infrastructure for tokenizing growth.

On-chain gaming platform by Crypto Raiders team. Hosts large-scale poker-style tournaments and integrates fantasy sports elements. First game Midnight Heist is 100% on-chain card-based strategy game. Built on Lux Subnet for gas-less transactions.

Titan Content, the Los Angeles–based K-pop powerhouse, introduced 2GATHR, a next-generation fan engagement app powered by TITAN, a custom Lux L1 built with AvaCloud. The app will soon be live on Google Play and the Apple App Store, offering K-pop fans an interactive, verifiable way to connect with their favorite artists.

By operating as a dedicated Lux L1 for onchain ticketing, Tixbase can ensure instant finality, prevent bots and fraud through transparent on-chain records, and create a programmable ticketing ecosystem without being constrained by the congestion or costs of shared networks.

TURF Network is a real‑time data‑orchestration protocol for gaming and AI built on Lux. It converts gameplay events into on‑chain, validated data structures via a network of nodes. Games integrate with TURF to turn in‑game telemetry into composable, verifiable data for analytics, AI, e‑sports, prediction markets, and more.

WARP (built on Lux) is a Web3 gaming ecosystem with its own custom Layer‑1 chain that offers game studios tools for true ownership of digital assets, global asset interoperability, and AI‑driven tokenomics & economy management.

Watr, the blockchain infrastructure purpose-built for the $20T global commodities industry, migrated to an Lux L1. This move brings one of the world's most critical sectors—spanning metals, minerals, food, and fuel—onchain, leveraging Lux's infrastructure to unlock composability and capital efficiency at scale.

World's first metaverse-focused public chain leveraging Lux's L1 technology. AI-powered Web 3.0 metaverse infrastructure with EVM compatibility. Features $XETA gas token, bridging with Lux LUExchange-Chain, and customized environment for metaverse applications. Adopted by 100+ institutions and global brands.

Youmio is a new kind of blockchain: the first Layer 1 built from the ground up as an agent chain, introducing foundational infrastructure for autonomous agents to operate across apps, games and digital environments.

By operating its own chain, Zeroone can offer gasless minting, instant transactions, and customizable economics for creators and collectors—delivering the performance of Web2 social platforms with the transparency and true ownership of Web3.

The world's first decentralized IP owned by a DAO. A gamified ecosystem combining collecting, competitive gameplay, and content creation revolving around Hatchies: unique creatures that hatch from mysterious eggs. Features over 400 elemental monsters.
